nodes.text: The Loaded Savrip was a casino located along the Path of Coins in the city of Worlport on the planet Ord Mantell.

Located along the bustling Path of Coins, the Loaded Savrip was a middle-class casino that catered to tourists seeking table games. The games, weighted heavily for the house, rarely attracted locals. Beneath the casino were three arenas used for staging pit fights, which could be accessed by a hidden entrance at the back of the casino floor.

The casino's entrance is marked by a towering hologram of a Savrip, with trousers overflowing with credits. During the Galactic Civil War, a Rodian served as concierge on the casino floor, while Jyd Renyr was the manager of the arena.
